briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Everolimus in Liver Transplant Recipients of Living Donor Liver Transplants
officialTitle: A 24 Month, Randomized, Controlled, Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Concentration-controlled Everolimus Plus Reduced Tacrolimus Compared to Standard Tacrolimus in Recipients of Living Donor Liver Transplants and Long Term Extension to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Concentration-controlled Everolimus Plus Reduced Tacrolimus Compared to Standard Tacrolimus in Recipients of Living Donor Liver Transplants in Japan
summary: The purpose of this trial was to demonstrate the efficacy and safety of everolimus in combination with reduced tacrolimus, compared to tacrolimus control, in living donor liver transplant recipients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Composite Efficacy Failure of Treated Biopsy Proven Acute Rejection, Graft Loss or Death in Everolimus With Reduced Tacrolimus Group Compared to Standard Tacrolimus
